values: It doesnt feel like i've gotten over you. But at the same time, i'm making myself believe i'm over you. Its difficult. Putting on a smile for everyone but deep inside, it hurts alot. Damn, i've been going through this situation alot. And i'm kinda getting used to it. HAHA, like deep inside you love her but on the outside, she doesnt mean a thing to you. HAHA, bullshit, but thats exactly what i'm trying to do. Which, i dont think is workling very well. I'm fucking weak and sensitive. Not to forget selfish. I can go and ge together with another girl, but i get all pissy and jealous when she talks about a guy. Or just some random guy. I try, try my best not to feel a thing but, i can never stop myself from feeling what i want to. I cant just stop myself from reacting to whatever i want to. Okay, it sounded better in my head. HAHA, i'm starting to sound like her. Awesome. Right. i can go on and on, and i dont wish too. I love myself, and i know we have something in common HAHA.

Its exactly 10.10pm, 10/10/2010. And well, i’ve always wanted to ask you, Abigail Cera Jacqueline Anthony to be my girlfriend today. Like on this day. Its nothing special but its a very nice date and since i dont get you today, maybe i could wait for 11/11/2011 to come at exactly 11.11pm. HAHAHHA. You know, i dont mind waiting. Like seriously. I really love you. Like i’m fucking in love with you. And everyone knows that very well. But you. You just dont see it like, you are not aware of how much you mean to me and how much i’m dying to be with you. And you constantly hurt me. I dont understand you seriously. I still remember the first time we met. I was in the train, and my heart was beating faster than the drums and i had butterflies in my stomach, i actually went out of work, just like that to meet you. And you have no idea how nervous i was. But yea we met, and it was really awesome. Like we did get along well and like that was the first time i managed to look in your eyes and tell myself, i am in love with this girl. We were talking alot. Like really alot. And after we went to Poly to get MC, we went under a block, swear to god i dont know what block it is but, i really wanted to kiss you. I just dont have the guts when it comes to all this. Well, firstly, i dont have the guts and secondly, i dont know how to kiss. And thirdly, it was our first meeting, i dont wanna make a fool out of myself. And well, we kissed, well, you made the first move. And i swear to god i love it. I love every moment of it. Then we started meeting often. And till now, everytime i’m on my way to meeting you, my heart beats faster than the drums and my stomach will be full of butterflies. And sometimes, i cant even speak. You see, you make me have unexplained feelings everytime it concerns you. Like everytime i think about you, i have this strong feeling in my heart, like seriously. Not the beating but a feeling that will make me smile to myself, like its so ticklish. And everytime i imagine your smile, without even realising, i’ll be smiling too. Imagining how your lips will look like and how beautiful your teeths are. Bottom line, you have the most beautiful smile ever. And when i think about your eyes, i wish i could hold your face now, look into your eyes and just make out with you. Arggghhh fuck. Your lips are fucking soft. Like you’ll never wanna stop. You’ll just keep wanting more. But as i was saying, your eyes, they shine. Like its watery not cause you cry but its just the way it is not that watery just perfect and it really is beautiful. Your hair, its annoying sometimes when its a hot day and i see your hair covering your face, i get annoyed. But naturally, you look hot everytime your hair falls down and cover half your eyes. And i love putting it back neatly behind your ears. And looking in your eyes. Now, i wish i could hold you in my arms and give you a kiss on your forehead. And i’ll tell you this, i dont just kiss anyone on their forehead. So, you mean alot to me. What can i say, you are just special. And i mean it. You’re amazing, you’re awesome, you’re beautiful, gorgeous, hot, sweet, sexy, adorable, cute, annoying, noisy, talkative but, i love you alot. No matter what, i’ll still love you. I really dont know how to explain to you how much you mean to me. But hey, not to forget, your smell. Gosh, i would love to hug you and not let go man. Seriously, i love you, and your smell. Its just so freaking nice. I love it laaaaa. Okay Rj burger is starting soon. As much as i wanna type more. I wont. HAHAH, its not like i’m sending it to you HAH. I’ll keep it to myself. For referrence (: Hey babylove, i love you very much. So much that i would sacrifice my life for you. I would never do anything to hurt you i love you so damn much Abby. I miss you.

I feel so retarded now thanks to you. So here you go ))):

I didnt talk to you the whole of yesterday. I slept with my necklace in my hand. Like i tried to sleep but i couldnt, and i held on it on one hand and the other hand i hold my phone just in case you get to call me. Gosh i miss you so badly. But, i got to talk to you today! i'm really happy about it. HAHAH. I'm talking to you and i'm happyyyyyyy!

i love you

You crash it all with a bitchy and feeling-less message. i should have known. I've been a hypocrite smiling and laughing like nothing happened but deep inside its hurting damn badly. I put aside my pride for you. I put aside everything else just for you. Sacrificing time, money, everything man. How could you. And now you are so happy when i'm here suffering. Wondering how to let you go. Fucking annoying. How i wished i never knew you. But after all the pain, its still you i love. Fuck my life!

I have no idea why i'm thinking so much about you. Seriously, i thought you are over. Like 2 months back maybe? Fuck la so annoying. i miss you in everyway. Shit man! Its like a sudden flash back. And all i'm thinking about is you damn it. I miss you saying my name. FUCK!

This is so painful. I want to let you go, but i dont have the guts too. And maybe, even if i have the guts i wont. I know it'll hurt. Sigh, i really want you to be mine. If only its much easier for it to happen. O's is always the reason. Its fucking annoying. Why are you so young, urghhh. Forget it, hangover is damn fucked up now. Going to sleep.
you are like a dictionary, you add meaning into my life.

I know i'll be searching for you when the game starts.
And get all fucked up cause you cant be there.
Although i know you'll be very busy.
I really want you to be there.

I never believed in such things like read your future or love life by cards or whatever. Like its just not true, from my opinion. But, i tried it out yesterday, And the first few things she said, made my heart beat through the whole session. I was curious, i was scared, there was feelings that was in me which i cant describe. But somehow, whatever she said seem so true. Like the things she said for the rest who were there last night came true. And if mine were to be fake, its nonsense. And after all that, i dont think things will happen the wayi've been wanting it to be. I really regret knwing. I'm not scared of the new person entering my life, i'm scared that you will no longer be part of my life.

I hear them say, love is the way.
Love is the answer thats what they say.

I thought i could trust my hearts in making decisions.
But its actually not functioning anymore.

I cant wait for tournament to come. Althought i dont think my team is ready, i'm excited. I really hope you'll be there. I really want you to be there. I know you wont be so free to come down for my games. But if you could make it for one of the games, i'll be happy i swear. I can be the happiest player alive that day. I really want you to be there. You are my strength. And i miss you.
You shine my world with your smile.

let go when you’re hurting too much,
give up when love isn’t enough,
and move on when things are not like before.
For sure there is someone out there who will love you even more.

It was just a bad dream. Thank god.
Please reach home safely.
I'll pray for your safety.
i love you.
You are simply the best
I'm miss you more than you can ever imagine.

HAH, even after people say you were being a bitch. And even after you admit you were being a bitch. And even when i know it hurts. I dont blame you. And i never will. I know whatever you did was for our own good. Life's getting better for you. And i'm pretty sure, it'll get better for me. I asked you all those questions out of curiousity. I know it wasnt easy for you. And i know why you said all that. I understand. But honestly, that wasnt what i wanna hear even though i know thats what you'll answer. Tsk, i really miss the times we had. But i know the times i had with you were the best days of my life (: I hope you think the same way too (:

I'm very tired, but i cant sleep. I have training tomorrow, and i cant wait. Tournament's coming up damn soon. I want West to be champion. But with people training like there's always time, i dont think so. Everyone's taking it so lightly. Sigh, i feel like talking to you but i'm preventing myself from doing that. Can i still talk to you about how i feel about certain stuff when i cant talk to anyone else about it? I feel lonely sometimes. Even when there's so many friends there for me. Its not that i dont talk to them, i just know they dont get it. And yknow everything. About me. Which makes it all even better. Arghhhh, i'm going to sleep soon. I'm taking sleeping pills tonight. I have training. I have to sleep. 

The flower said i wish i tree 
The tree said i wish i could be a different kinda tree 
The cat wish that it was a bee 
The turtle wish that it could fly 
Really high into the sky 
Over rooftops and then dive deep into the sea.

Yesterday was polite training. It was okay. And the good news is i got in. I got selected. I wanted you to be the first to know but i couldnt contact you yesterday for some reason. And so i tried talking to you today. I wanted to tell you face to face and see your reaction, so i came up with an excuse. I wanted you to take back your sweater. But you got it all wrong. I wanted to tell you i'm selected. And it all turn out a disaster. I'm sorry if you think i'm stalking you. The last time i went to your condo, i need to use the toilet and it was already done. Thats how i know. Not cause i go there all the time. You seem like another person around your friends. I dont know what you told them about me till i seem like a joke when i want to tell you that i'm selected for Polite. If you are trying to break my heart, its working. Thanks alot.

Sometimes i feel that the world is against me
Till i hear your voice, baby that's what saves me
When we're together i feel so invincible
(written by you, 27/8/09, 2 am)

If you love something, let it go.
If it comes back its forever yours.
If it doesnt, than its never meant to be.

Love the people who treat you right,
Forget about the ones who dont.
Believe that everything happen for a reason.
You you get a chance take it.
If its gonna change your life let it be.
Nobody said that it'll be easy
They just promise it'll be worth it.

Never should have let you go.

I've realised the changes,
how easily i get scared,
i'm being impulsive at times
Shit, i think i'm getting it from you
And i somehow think we switched places.

We dont wanna fall but
we're tripping in our hearts
& its reckless and clumsy
cause i know you cant love me

I'll appear right at your window
When you think of me
I'll be at your window
When i'm missing you.

It doesnt change
You make me angry
Then i'll do the same
I say sorry and,
 you'll do the same (:

Yes, i miss all this crazy moments i had with this bitch. All the risk involved. All the fun we had. Its just insane. Tears, smiles, laughter. People used to tell her that i'm a player, i dont stick to one. HAH, see whats happening now, i cant fucking let her go. Still think i'm a fucking player? Gosh, i cant believe we got together. AHAHA, some of your friends used to say its impossible between you and me. See how long we last, how far we got. Awesome huh? You'll always be my love. You dont have to own her to love her. HAH, I've been trying real hard to move on. Maybe, i'm trying to hard. But if i dont try, i wont know. So, i did try, and nothing is happening. I just miss you even more. I'm really happy for you, you know. Like seriously, i can see you smiling everyday. And that makes me happy. Hey, please remember, i'm here for you okay? You have my number please dont bar my number HAHAH. Text or call me if there is anything. I'll be there no matter what.

i said it all out of anger.
i'm sorry, you should be too.

Everytime i look at it, i feel the pain.
Although its been gone for 5 months.
i feel so fucking stupid.
I feel like a fucking fool.

Is all i need. And i am being patient. 
I will find the right one soon. 

Thanks Shu <3

Jose, i dont know why i cannot get through you sia. I tried calling since 4, the time i woke up. I didnt pick up when you call cause i was sleeping laaaaa. Anw, what movie you wanna watch, someone told me, the last song dont have alr ))): How? Then what movie? Do you wanna watch at night or tmr? Cause i really cannot get through you la damn it. Call me soon. 

Thanks people for helping me (:

Help me forget her, please god, i cant help myself.
Make me strong. Help me go through all this.

Today was awesome. Well, paper was awesome. Thanks to you. After paper slack with the guys then went home. The paper was surprisingly easy. Like i knew all the answers to the question. See, i told you i just need to talk to you. I'm not talking crap, its just the truth. Monday i screwed the paper like shit, at least today, HAH, i did well, i must say. Credits, to you. 

Afternoon met Shikin, Ass and 2 of her friends. Talk alot and then i dont really know why i had the sudden urge to meet you. I have that stupid feeling like i have to meet you, so since i was at the bus stop, i took 173. All the way to your bus stop. I smoked like 12 sticks waiting for you. Well, i know you didnt want to meet me, but i need to. i really miss you. Gosh today was awesome. Thank you. LIke seriously. You made my day. And btw, when you were texting and scolding, i was laughing to myself. You never scold me its just funny. HAHHAHA, and, you better watch out arh, beat me right. You just wait, 

i wonder how i managed to hold my tears

This is what i'm always afraid of. This feeling. This lost. But still, it happened months ago. I dont know why i cant get over it. Why i still cant let myself to let you go. It suck la. Honestly, yes i love you and all but i dont like being screwed. Like i'm totally screwed, with life, studies. I'm not blaming you. Its just that, i was really into studying and taking good care of myself cause i know i have you and you always want the best for me. But now, i dont feel the need. Maybe, i dont feel anything but pain. I wish you were here.

I'm lonely and i'm tired
I'm missing you again

Its bothering me, its scaring me. I dont usually get scared easily. I dont know whats happening but it feels heavy. To let go. I've been lying to myself. Wayyyy to much. Ughhhh, i cant stand it anymore. I have been lying to myself, to everyone, to you. I just cant take it anymore. I am not strong enough to move on. I never thought it would be this difficult to just let go off someone. Yknow someone said to me, you're special, and yknow what, she's fucking right. I dont know if there's anyone other than me who have said that to you, but you are really special. I cant bottle up anymore. I just need to let it out. I miss you, i still love you.I still cant move on, i cant forget you. I need you so badly.

Dear God, the only thing i ask of you is to hold her when i'm not around when i'm much too far away.

I'm messed up. Gosh
I miss you. Fuck
I love you

I am gonna screw my exams. i know i will right from the start. Sigh, i studied. i did. But like i've been through a few exams for the past 2 years and you've been there for me. Even if i dont study, i know i can do well. I have the motivation. But now, i feel so dead. Sigh, this is my last year in ITE, i want to end here. I dont want to retake another 6 months. But i dont know if i can make it. But i'll try, real hard. 

I'm messed up.

Today, was kinda annoying, like seriously. I was supposed to goto school for make up lessons. Like me alone. So, i came to school at 1pm, the time was given from the teacher. So yea i came, and the class was used so i searched for him and he was asleep. So after 15 minutes, i came back and then he told me that class is cancelled. Like WTF? i came all the way to school for nothing. Stupid teacher, so yea. 

Met baby, and b. HAHAHA, Lina and Spade. Send lina to work after lunch then back to woodlands for soccer. Awesome shit. HAHHA. Really like it. So yea, reached home at around 8 and then Victoria was under my block. So talked awhile and i went home. I wanted to sleep awhile. I'm meeting her later so yea. So you should wait HAHHAHA.

i miss you.

Yesterday was training. Did runs and then Sonia came to me to say i can play for West (: I was so happy. Till, somebody ask me if annie will be coming for our tournament. Its really fucked up la actually. Everything/everyone keeps reminding me of her. I'm over her, i guess. Just dont push it. I can take it once in a while but all the time? Its been so long. So long since me and Annie have nothing to do with each other. So yes, we are friends, i guess. Just that. So stop asking me about her. It annoys the shit out of me. Not cause i hate her but i hate getting reminded of her. So please, thank you (:

So, went out with Victoria last night. HAHAHA, jose was there. And a few more friends. Surprisingly, we didnt drink. We played lots of games. Like stupid games i must say but yea, i had fun, and i feel young around you people. HAHAHHA. sorry, i just do. And thanks for making me feel better after an annoying, tiring day. Supper was delicious (: Swimming was insane. HAHHA, told you we'll get chased out. HAHHA. So yea, overall, you girls made my day (: Thank you.

Please give me the strength to go through it all over again.

Shit, after months, i finally get to pull myself through. Now, it feels like i'm falling again. 
I hate it when i cant control my feelings and its taking control over me. Like i myself am hopeless.
If only i have the guts to just forget you for good. I dont think of you as much. but i wanna talk t you.
Like at night when i finally wanna go to slp. I feel like i cant sleep unless i get to listen to you.
Its happening all over again. I thought after not talking to you for so long. i'm over you.
But the moment i listen to your voice and know what you're gonna say next after every phrase.
It reminds me alot. Ughhhh. This is bullshit. IMANNNNNNNNNNNNNN, HELP ME ):

Shit, i feel shitty. Its coming back. Its my fault. I shouldnt have done that i know i'll fall back down. But i couldnt help it. I just need to listen to her voice. I just need to know if she's really fine. Even when she say she is, i cant stop myself from stopping there. I wanna go further. i wanna meet her, i wanna know more. I'm stupid. Ughhhhh, now i dont know what to do. But i'm cool infront of her. Its just when we hang up and when she stop texting i feel the kinda feeling i have been feeling all this while. The lost, the loneliness. Oh Fuck.

Its crazy how things happen. I was starting to think that things will change. Maybe i was moving on already. At last. But its all bullshit. I thought you were good enough for me. I thought you'll be as abit serious as i was. But bullshit, you just dont care about my feelings. HAH. But now, i wont care already, wont be bothered. You'll come back if you're mine. I know you ant me to fight for you, i guess. But i dont like to. I use violence Thats me. So yea, i rather not do anything. Just take care babe (:

I've been wondering if its worth the pain.
But clearly now, it was, but not anymore.
And i'm really happy with the change.

- somehow, i think you are very skinny alr.

Anw, i argued with my dad. Okay more like a fight. Punches and stuff so yea, fight. Sometimes, i wish you were here to talk to me. Like before. But i'm scared. Not really sure why but yea. And i have to thank Iman, i'm not talking to you. HAHAH. Its kinda funny but Iman, is my pillar of strength now.

so crazy is this thing we call love
and now that we've got it we just cant give up

25 february was like 3 months ago, i guess. I'm glad to know that i'm moving on, slowly. Now, i wont talk about you at all but i'll fall for you at night. And i think it'll all be gone soon. And we'll be just friends. Like we were once i hope. So yea, nothing much has been going on, just school, fucked up. And girls, annoying. Floorball, sadly suspended. Friends, awesome! HAHAH

I have lots of new friends, used to tell you i dont have time for all this but yea, i'm having alot more friends (: Yknow, i feel really happy knwing that you're happy and stuff like that. It makes me happy, really. Now, i think what we did was the right thing. It was the right move. I'm so so happy for you. Seriously! Sometimes i do miss the times we had. But i know, what we had once, will always be the best moments of my life :D 

so what do i do~
cause i still love you~

Went out with the floorball team, to sentosa. Woke up at 9 in the morning and everyone reached habourfront at like 11. So yea, straight to sentosa. I swear today was damn awesome. Jellyfish was all over the place, its jellyfish season, thats why. Played soccer, captains ball, volleyball and everything else that we could do with a ball. Uno, siwmming. It was really awesome. We drank abit, smoke ALOT! haha, shark bought 2 pack at sentosa itself at like okay 12? and at 6 he was left with 5 sticks? damn  awesome la that bitch. 


And oh. the best part is, everyone was wearing Ray- Ban's. Hahaha, damn funny. And ours are all original. So left sentosa at like 8? ate at habourfront and off home. Okay, i'm damn tired. goodnight.

life gets better

So, haha, yesterday out with Fel and Iman. Goodness, it was really hot at the flee market and it was fucking crowded. Did a few rounds cause dear Iman wanted to shop. Then slacked at Farah's booth. For like damn long. It was really boring but the stuff there are pretty cool. like some bags are really nice. If i was smart enough to withdraw my money earlier, i would have bought it. So yea, got to know a few new friends and they are awesome. 

Omg, Fel and Iman, if you guys are gonna read this. i cant believe i didnt ask for her number. Like seriously regret it. She look so damn innocent and she looks so adorable. And her eyes are brown. Hahaha. Thanks to Iman la, shop only! Herh ): Sigh, she's so adorable. Left without me ): 

Anw, at night met a friend. Had like supper and haha slack till almost 3 last night. i miss doing that. And good news. I'm moving on. Nomore msges in my handphone. photos and letters, i'm just gonna keep them for memories. Annie Lim, thank you for all the beautiful times we had. I hope we'll be able to enjoy our time together again as goodfriends (: 

life goes on.

Life sucks even more without you around. I miss you Mak. I wish you were here to stop me from crying and to tell me that you are here for me. Talked to mama through facebook for the past half and hour and was telling her everything about my life. And yes, Annie, was like Mak to be exact. Everything she does. The way she looks into my eyes, the way she nags, the way she eats. And the best part is, both of them left me. Sigh, i did whatever to not think about her but everynight when i'm about to fall aslp, i'll think of her.

But i am going to be strong, i wont let her pull me down. I'm gonna stand for myself now. I will move on. I will fucking move on Annie (:

So, i'm meeting Iman and Fel, going for Farah's flee market at somerset. I'm really grateful to have friends like them. Believe or not. Thanks people (: haha, gtg bath meeting you guys soon.

This is life!

You see, i really dislike being friends with my ex's. Like i think its stupid. But now, i think its awesome. I've been crying everyday. And i wont be able to sleep at night. Thats been happening for like 3 days. So, i feel really dead. And the best part is, i have to be forced to eat. So annoying. Anyway, i'm really happy we can be friends. I know, you've been sacrificing too much for me, living a lie everyday, taking so much risk, so if i were to ask you to get back together with me, i'm being selfish. I know you want to cut all ties with me but we've been together for way too long and you are part of me. And when you suddenly vanish, i feel so lost. And the only thing i can do now is, be a friend. I'm glad, at least, you are still gonna be part of me. No matter what it is, i love you so much.

So, Shahril's birthday chalet. Saturday to this afternoon. Reached there at 5 yesterday, set up all the things then started eating. The food are all home cook so yea. Then lots of people started coming. We were jamming in the evening. TIll like 7.30, cut cake. Swimming!!! Swimming was awesome. Like sometimes when i'm in thw swimming pool, i feel relief. Idky. Haha, so swimming till 10. Then people start leaving. Left with me, Stacey and Shahril, so we stayed up all night. We had our own gig till 2 then we go to the beach. Drank alot. And yea, i got drunk. Stacey and Shahril didnt drink much. So, they were taking care of me. Haha, the funniest part was, on thw way back to the chalet. A group of mat's were staring at Stacey. And since i was drunk, i swear at them like mad. And there was an arguement till this couple came. Damn funny. Okay, i'm going out for a drink. Will be back by 5. And by then i'll be going to school Awesome.

i love you.
